programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Queen of the Bay - Chase Anna to the Townies’ lair, where Mia and her newborn pups are hiding out. See the babies’ first swimming lessons before the clan moves to new digs, and welcome an era of otter peace as the Mangrove Family becomes a park’s main attraction.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Social - Meet alphas who get by with a little help from their friends. Discover the inescapable gang mentality of mating male dolphins, ponder ant colonies’ unique scents, find out why female geladas always get the last word, and see wolves hunt family-style.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Scrappy - Celebrate small but mighty animal warriors armed with sheaves of scary weapons. Admire nutrias’ stink bombs; honey badgers’ savage, needle-like choppers; black-tailed gulls’ razor-sharp beaks; and the killer talons on dive-bombing peregrine falcons.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Lyca the Painted Wolf - In central Namibia, a pack of painted wolves roams the arid land. Amid threats from lions and drought, a plucky little pup called Lyca has to grow up fast, learn the skills of a hunter, and find her place as member of the pack.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Bahamas Exuma Cays - The Exuma Cays are a remote wonder: hundreds of tiny islands extending south from the Bahamian Capital of Nassau. In the 1950’s, developers dreamed of developing this pristine, and largely unexplored region. But before construction could begin, the Bahamian government supported an expedition to chart the cays. They liked what they saw, and in 1959 established the Bahamas National Trust, creating the Bahamas’ first Ocean Park.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep2
programme.desc: March-April - a Time of Renewal - Travel around the globe to witness the atmospheric shifts that take place in March, from the wave of cherry blossoms that unfold across Japan to the final raft of green sea turtles that arrive on the Great Barrier Reef islands to lay eggs.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Laos: the Mountain Wilds - Laos is a country where most of its western is demarcated by the Mekong River. Being one of the most pristine natural landscapes, Laos plays host to a diverse animal kingdom. It’s topography is largely mountainous, and this steep terrain is blanketed by northern Laos’s tropical rain and monsoon forests.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Choices - Learn how Ningaloo’s conservation miracle could inspire humans to pull the planet back from the brink of climatic destruction. Visit an abandoned whaling station and other ruins that show we have the tools, if only we can find the will to change.

programme.title: After the Wildfires
programme.desc: After the Wildfires - Examine fire’s pivotal role in shaping Australia’s natural world. Tour the devastation left by 2020’s brutal bush-fire season, learn how climate change fuelled this watershed event, and chart the long-term recovery of the continent’s wildlife.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep2
programme.desc: March-April - a Time of Renewal - Travel around the globe to witness the atmospheric shifts that take place in March, from the wave of cherry blossoms that unfold across Japan to the final raft of green sea turtles that arrive on the Great Barrier Reef islands to lay eggs.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Laos: the Mountain Wilds - Laos is a country where most of its western is demarcated by the Mekong River. Being one of the most pristine natural landscapes, Laos plays host to a diverse animal kingdom. It’s topography is largely mountainous, and this steep terrain is blanketed by northern Laos’s tropical rain and monsoon forests.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Road to Independence - As the babies grow, new power struggles break out in each troop. Watch as every member, from fierce Queen Crystal to low-ranking Erica, jockeys for position. Meanwhile, the babies start to understand how allies and enemies will shape their future.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Berenty Dynasty - The pressure to find food reaches new heights and throws the reserve into turmoil. Witness fractures emerge within the ranks, dividing the gangs and leading Crystal, the indomitable leader of the Ruins gang, to face a challenge like none before.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Social - Meet alphas who get by with a little help from their friends. Discover the inescapable gang mentality of mating male dolphins, ponder ant colonies’ unique scents, find out why female geladas always get the last word, and see wolves hunt family-style.

programme.desc: Lyca the Painted Wolf - In central Namibia, a pack of painted wolves roams the arid land. Amid threats from lions and drought, a plucky little pup called Lyca has to grow up fast, learn the skills of a hunter, and find her place as member of the pack.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Bahamas Exuma Cays - The Exuma Cays are a remote wonder: hundreds of tiny islands extending south from the Bahamian Capital of Nassau. In the 1950’s, developers dreamed of developing this pristine, and largely unexplored region. But before construction could begin, the Bahamian government supported an expedition to chart the cays. They liked what they saw, and in 1959 established the Bahamas National Trust, creating the Bahamas’ first Ocean Park.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Choices - Learn how Ningaloo’s conservation miracle could inspire humans to pull the planet back from the brink of climatic destruction. Visit an abandoned whaling station and other ruins that show we have the tools, if only we can find the will to change.

programme.title: After the Wildfires
programme.desc: After the Wildfires - Examine fire’s pivotal role in shaping Australia’s natural world. Tour the devastation left by 2020’s brutal bush-fire season, learn how climate change fuelled this watershed event, and chart the long-term recovery of the continent’s wildlife.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep2
programme.desc: March-April - a Time of Renewal - Travel around the globe to witness the atmospheric shifts that take place in March, from the wave of cherry blossoms that unfold across Japan to the final raft of green sea turtles that arrive on the Great Barrier Reef islands to lay eggs.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Laos: the Mountain Wilds - Laos is a country where most of its western is demarcated by the Mekong River. Being one of the most pristine natural landscapes, Laos plays host to a diverse animal kingdom. It’s topography is largely mountainous, and this steep terrain is blanketed by northern Laos’s tropical rain and monsoon forests.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Road to Independence - As the babies grow, new power struggles break out in each troop. Watch as every member, from fierce Queen Crystal to low-ranking Erica, jockeys for position. Meanwhile, the babies start to understand how allies and enemies will shape their future.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Berenty Dynasty - The pressure to find food reaches new heights and throws the reserve into turmoil. Witness fractures emerge within the ranks, dividing the gangs and leading Crystal, the indomitable leader of the Ruins gang, to face a challenge like none before.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Lyca the Painted Wolf - In central Namibia, a pack of painted wolves roams the arid land. Amid threats from lions and drought, a plucky little pup called Lyca has to grow up fast, learn the skills of a hunter, and find her place as member of the pack.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Scrappy - Celebrate small but mighty animal warriors armed with sheaves of scary weapons. Admire nutrias’ stink bombs; honey badgers’ savage, needle-like choppers; black-tailed gulls’ razor-sharp beaks; and the killer talons on dive-bombing peregrine falcons.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Choices - Learn how Ningaloo’s conservation miracle could inspire humans to pull the planet back from the brink of climatic destruction. Visit an abandoned whaling station and other ruins that show we have the tools, if only we can find the will to change.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Berenty Dynasty - The pressure to find food reaches new heights and throws the reserve into turmoil. Witness fractures emerge within the ranks, dividing the gangs and leading Crystal, the indomitable leader of the Ruins gang, to face a challenge like none before.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Pointy Bits - Avoid the swords, spikes, and deadly hood ornaments on these alpha hunters. Observe elands locking corkscrew horns, storks rattling sabre-shaped beaks, rhinos scaring the competition with massive horns, and striped marlins spearing unsuspecting prey.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Scroungers/Scavengers - Go scavenging with nature’s cleanup crew. See Tasmanian devils get into food fights with rivals; learn how dung beetles roll over the competition; view wild boars’ fierce mating strategies; and watch hyenas’ bone-crushing teeth demolish any meal.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Chinga the Lion Cub - In South Africa’s Greater Kruger Park, A little cub called Chiga has been born into family of hunters - the Mala Mala lion pride. Under the guidance of a devoted father, a fierce mother, and a playful sister, Chiga finds her place in the pride.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Kangaroo 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Mob Rules - The Eastern Grey kangaroo is a sociable species, clustering together in small groups known as mobs. A mob is a social network focused on feeding, where members will come and go as they please, depending on the availability of food.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep3
programme.desc: May-June - a Time of Volatility - Watch summer unfold in the Northern Hemisphere, while regions close to the equator enter the wet season and Southern Africa goes dry, creating scarcity for some creatures and bounty for others.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Thailand: Coming of Age - The Mekong continues its journey south marking the Eastern border of heart of South East Asia, Thailand. It is the juncture of many major regions, where temperate north meets tropical South, making it one of the most biodiverse countries in the world.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Road to Independence - As the babies grow, new power struggles break out in each troop. Watch as every member, from fierce Queen Crystal to low-ranking Erica, jockeys for position. Meanwhile, the babies start to understand how allies and enemies will shape their future.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Berenty Dynasty - The pressure to find food reaches new heights and throws the reserve into turmoil. Witness fractures emerge within the ranks, dividing the gangs and leading Crystal, the indomitable leader of the Ruins gang, to face a challenge like none before.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep3
programme.desc: May-June - a Time of Volatility - Watch summer unfold in the Northern Hemisphere, while regions close to the equator enter the wet season and Southern Africa goes dry, creating scarcity for some creatures and bounty for others.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Thailand: Coming of Age - The Mekong continues its journey south marking the Eastern border of heart of South East Asia, Thailand. It is the juncture of many major regions, where temperate north meets tropical South, making it one of the most biodiverse countries in the world.

programme.title: Valley of Flood and Fire 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Dying for Rain - South Luangwa National Park is one of Africa’s great wild places. Lying at the southern tip of Africa’s Great Rift Valley, its extraordinary mosaic of habitats supports a rich diversity of life. The fortune of every animal that lives here is inextricably linked to the two vastly different seasons they experience – the wet and the dry.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Secret Life of Snakes - The snakes of Australia are as diverse and striking as the landscape they inhabit; there are more than 300 different species here, some harmless to humans, others deadly. From the death adder which has a strike almost quicker than the human eye, to the scrub python which is equipped to track its prey, snakes know how to survive in this inhospitable land.

programme.title: Sort Your Life Out S2 Ep5
programme.desc: The Smith family embark upon a mammoth declutter. Stacey and the team challenge them to let go of half of their possessions, so that they can beautifully reorganise their life and home.

programme.title: Grand Designs: House of the Year S7 Ep4
programme.desc: Materials and Craftsmanship - Kevin and the experts look at a meticulously crafted barn conversion and a timber-framed, timber-clad eco home, before the winner of the RIBA House of the Year 2022 is announced.

programme.title: Eat Well For Less S7 Ep4
programme.desc: Gregg and Chris are in Scotland with a young family relying on takeaways and wasting food. Dad Ajaz wants spicy dishes whereas mum Aliyah prefers milder flavours, but can we get them eating more veg, enjoying the same food and saving money?

programme.title: Donal's Family Food in Minutes S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Donal shares a series of recipes that have been passed down through his family, including a winter pavlova, kleftico, lemon slices and coq au vin blanc.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall S1 Ep14
programme.desc: West Penwith is as far west as it is possible to go in mainland England. Rick explores its rich and diverse history, from Lamorna Cove, made famous through song and art, to the UNESCO-protected tin and copper mining area of Botallack.

programme.title: The Great Cookbook Challenge with Jamie Oliver S1 Ep7
programme.desc: It's the final chapter for the remaining cooks as they present their book concept and a range of recipes to the crème de la crème. Who has the ultimate recipe for success?

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Chocolat S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Special Occasions - Rachel celebrates the indulgent side of chocolate. She creates a luxurious chocolate mousse with a twist, and adds a chocolatey take to a pasta dish, cacio e pepe.

programme.title: Michela's Classic Italian S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Michela Chiappa's authentic but easy recipes are based on lessons learned from her Italian grandparents, but also reflect her contemporary tastes.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off S12 Ep4
programme.desc: Dessert Week - The bakers put their twist on the classic pavlova and take on a toffee technical, before creating a delicate dessert wrapped in intricately patterned sponge for a splendid showstopper.

programme.title: Gino's Italy: Like Mamma Used To Make S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Torre Del Greco - Gino D'Acampo celebrates the women who have fuelled and fed his fellow Italians through the ages, beginning in his birthplace of Torre Del Greco.

programme.desc: Venice - Chef Angela Hartnett takes Fred to Venice to enjoy the simple but stunning food at her favourite restaurant and to experience unforgettable service at Italy's oldest cafe.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Claire's Pop Up Tent - Simon and the team are in an area of outstanding natural beauty, the Blackdown Hills, to help theatrical prop maker Clare with a truly unique project. She has big plans to turn a 1960's trailer tent into funky festival themed accommodation.

programme.title: Jamie's One-Pan Wonders S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Jamie shares more fabulous one-pan dishes: foolproof tray-baked salmon in a bag; super-easy tomato fritters that you can rattle out in a frying pan; and roasted rolled pork and a risotto that are BOTH cooked in the same casserole pan. Result!

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Chocolat S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Wow Factor - Rachel serves up a chocolate-lover's ice cream dream, makes chocolate bread, and visits London to sample chocolate from around the world.

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals S14 Ep7
programme.desc: In heat four, the Skills Test involves eggs benedict and a strawberry dessert. Then each of the four chefs must wow the judges with their Signature Dishes to earn a quarter-final place.

programme.title: Grand Designs S18 Ep1
programme.desc: South West London - In South West London Justin plans to restore a neo-Gothic cemetery keeper's lodge and convert its toilet block into a luxury extension complete with a moat and swimming pool. But can he keep his budget under control?

programme.title: Jamie's One-Pan Wonders S1 Ep3

programme.desc: Men In Black - A fleet of glimmering orbs stalk the skies above Anchorage.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien: Exiled Ep63
programme.desc: Out Of The Foosa Pen And Into The Fire - King Julien and his army plan to trap Koto; Mort must get his army to the lemur kingdom to help King Julien; Clover agrees to marry Koto

programme.title: All Hail King Julien: Exiled Ep64
programme.desc: The Day After Yesterday - King Julien's attempts to destroy Koto were unsuccessful but the allies he's formed all come to help out, and Koto's wedding turns into all-out battle

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep13
programme.desc: Rescue - Cleo and the rest go on a rescue mission to crime-ridden Hykosis City, which leads to a devastating confrontation with Octavian.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep14
programme.desc: Mihos - Cleo encounters an adorable alien creature and brings him home, along with his eggs. Wait, if he’s a “him,” how does he have eggs? Aliens are weird.

programme.title: Madly Madagascar Ep1
programme.desc: Madly Madagascar - Romance is in the air for Alex, Marty, Gloria and Melman after King Julien discovers a magical perfume and takes on the role as "King of Love."

programme.title: Merry Madagascar Ep1
programme.desc: Merry Madagascar - When Santa unexpectedly crash lands on the island, giving the jolly gentleman a case of amnesia - it's up to those zany zoosters to save Christmas!

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep77
programme.desc: The End Is Near - When King Julien learns that Clover may marry Sage, he sets out to prepare the kingdom for post-Clover attacks

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep78
programme.desc: The End Is Here - When King Julien and the gang bury Sage for his bachelor party, things don't go according to plan and they must deal with Franken-Sage!

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep26
programme.desc: Gherkin Returns / This Blows - The 5th Mighty One, Gherkin, visits for the weekend but Berry’s perplexed to discover that he’s changed. / The Mighty Ones get stuck in a vortex created by a leaf blower war between neighbors.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep21
programme.desc: Spell - As he tries to restore the magic spell that will protect San Lorenzo, Puss accidentally brings Artephius's macramé owl shop to life.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep43
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Abandoned Artifact Of The Absentee Aliens - After George and Harold learn the truth about their mission, Dupe Licitous enlists the entire crew in a quest to repair a rogue satellite.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep44
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Hazardous Hysteria Of The Hangry Hypnosinger - Everybody on the spaceship has been cryogenically frozen for three months — everyone, that is, except Krupp, who's wide awake and happily in charge.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep41
programme.desc: Extreme Sleepover Club / Vega Swift - Smidge, Guy, Cooper, and Biggie throw an impromptu sleepover in the Fun Factory. But when unexpected visitors show up, will they avoid getting in trouble?/ Satin and Chenille are tasked with babysitting Luna Swift, Nova’s toddler niece. But she proves to be a bit of a handful

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep42
programme.desc: Scrapbookmobile / Troll Rangers - When Biggie accidentally destroys a beloved scrapbook, he and Poppy set out to replace it by having a scrapbook-worthy adventure./ CJ Suki and Priscilla embark on a journey to earn Junior Troll Ranger patches for mastering Trolly activities.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep42
programme.desc: Night Owls - Boss arranges a sleepover with Quiet Psycho Baby to get access to her father the Mayor's day planner, hoping to plant his own pro-baby agenda. However, staying up all night has the unexpected consequence of delusional over-tiredness! Tim sneaks into an art film and decides he has to be a grown-up now, so Mom and Dad try to "kid" him up again.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep43
programme.desc: OCB - Boss' reign as CEO is threatened by a charming, multiple-dimpled Outside Consultant Baby (OCB) hired by the Board of Directors. Boss, furious that OCB will ruin Baby Corp with his poorly thought out ideas, tries to distract him while Staci adds the finishing touches to a project that will make OCB unnecessary, The 24 Hour Diaper.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep21
programme.desc: Night of the White Bone Demon - In a giant sea battle, Po and the Kids manage to escape the pursuing police to make it to Volcano island and get some answers. Empress Xiao begins learning how to defend herself.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep42
programme.desc: Midnight Scrum - When Viggo puts a bounty on Hiccup's head, every Dragon Hunter in the world is after capturing Hiccup, so Toothless and the Riders must rescue him.

programme.desc: Gruff Around The Edges - When a distant cousin of the Twins named Gruffnut arrives on Dragon's Edge, Tuffnut tries to impress him, but Gruffnut may not be the hero he seems.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep68
programme.desc: Primrose Loses It - Primrose has broken her new necklace and lost the beads. She is unconsolable. Violet holds a make and do party to replace the necklace

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep69
programme.desc: Dr Webby - Bumble's sneezing has got so bad, it is keeping everyone awake at night. Webby gives Fifi a recipe for a cure for sneezes… will it work?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep70
programme.desc: Make Room For Fifi - There is a horrid smell in Fifi's garden. Fifi goes to stay with Primrose and Violet while they try and work out where the smell is coming from. What could be causing it?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep71
programme.desc: Slugsy's Song - Slugsy has found something really special. Only Primrose can be persuaded to go and see it with him. Even she is surprised by what she sees!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep29
programme.desc: How Can We Make The Most Beautiful Garden Ever? - Poor Mimi! Her normally beautiful garden is all messy and full of swirly piles of earth. She's really upset and Jess promises to her help her make it the most beautiful garden ever! Raking away the swirls doesn't work, they just come back! Jess and Mimi realise that worms are making the swirly piles of earth. Mimi wants to move them away but they go back underground before she can catch them. When it rains the worms come back and Jess and Mimi gather up the worms in a bucket and take them to live in the orchard by a patch of scrappy flowers. The garden still isn't looking at it's best though! After the worms have gone Mimi's flowers go all droopy. Willow explains that worms make help make the soil rich and good for plants – and that's what makes the flowers bloom. Jess remembers that the worms had come out when it rained. They water the ground to bring the worms up to the surface again. The worms agree to come back to Mimi's garden and soon her garden is beautiful again. Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep30
programme.desc: Why Are There Little Hills In The Orchard? - Jess and the pups have been looking after the orchard while Willow's been on holiday but the day she's due back the orchard is full of little piles of earth. What's making them? That's the Big Question. Jess wonders if someone put them there. He asks Mimi, who's making a pile of earth while she digs a hole. She tells him she's going to plant an apple tree. Maybe someone's been planting new apple trees in the orchard thinks Jess. But when he looks carefully there are no holes or newly planted trees. Horace the hoppy frog suggests that maybe it's an invisible digger who's digging underground. Billie the little mouse arrives and tells Jess that the little piles of earth are called molehills. Jess works out that the piles of earth are in a line. Maybe someone is digging a tunnel underground so they can travel right across the orchard. They keep very quiet and a tiny mole pops out above ground. That's who's been making piles of earth in the orchard. They've answered the question. Hooray!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep31
programme.desc: Why Are There So Many Ladybirds? - One winter morning Jess finds lots of ladybird in his barn. Why are they there? That's the Big Question! Mimi tells him that she has lots of ladybirds in her garden in the summer. They're always hungry and brilliant for the plants because they eat all the greenfly. Maybe they're looking for greenfly in his barn? Jess doesn't think so. There are no greenfly in the barn. He goes to ask Baa and Billie for help. They're saying goodbye to Little Bird who's flying away to a warmer country for the winter. Jess thinks maybe the ladybirds are gathering to fly away too and rushes back to his barn to say goodbye. But when he gets there he finds that the ladybirds are now all huddled together and fast asleep. What's going on? Jess goes to ask Willow and finds a hedgehog sleeping under some leaves near the stable. Willow explains that some animals find it hard to find food in the winter, especially if they can't store it, so they eat as much as they can and then go to sleep during the winter. It's called hibe

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep32
programme.desc: How Can I Stop Little Bird Eating The Seeds? - Mimi's really upset with Little Bird who keeps eating all her lettuce seeds. Jess wonders how they can stop her. They try putting out extra food for her but Little Bird just eats everything! Jess wonders if covering the seeds with something so that Little Bird can't reach them would work. Mimi says it's a good idea but the sun won't reach the seeds either – which means they won't grow. The only thing that seems to stop t Little Bird is when she sees Jess and is frightened away. But Jess can't stand still in the vegetable patch forever! Willow sees him and tells him he's being a scarecrow. A scarecrow? Yes, something that scares away the birds. Mimi has a brilliant idea to make the perfect scarecrow. A Jess scarecrow. Little Bird stops eating the lettuce seeds and eats from the lovely bird table they put out for her instead. Hooray!

programme.title: Olivia Ep31
programme.desc: Olivia Becomes A Vet - After a trip to the vet with Julian's pet lizard Bernie, Olivia is inspired to become a vet herself. She imagines herself curing all kinds of wild animals, and back home she goes to work on the only two patients available: her pets! Her treatments for Edwin and Perry turn out to be a bit messier than she expected.

programme.title: Olivia Ep32
programme.desc: Olivia Becomes A Chef - It's Mother's birthday, and Olivia's planning something really special: a surprise dinner, with all red food. Imagining she's a famous chef with Dad and Ian as her helpers, the real challenge is keeping mum out of the kitchen while they prepare her special meal.

programme.title: Olivia Ep33
programme.desc: Olivia Explores The Attic - Olivia searches high and low for Grandma's missing time capsule, and eventually finds it tucked away, forgotten, in the attic. Olivia is puzzled and thrilled by the objects that she finds from Grandmother's childhood, and is inspired to create her own time capsule.

programme.title: Olivia Ep34
programme.desc: Olivia's Good Luck - Olivia is determined to sell more Young Pioneers cookies than anybody else in her troupe – especially Francine. It turns out to be harder than she thought it would be, but with a little perseverance and ingenuity, Olivia manages to do her personal best.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep29
programme.desc: Why Wildebeest Stampede - You see there was a time when Wildebeest didn't stampede. They used to stand on the plains and munch grass all day. But there were so many of them and they were eating so much grass that all the animals had to do something about it. Tortoise realized that the Wildebeest weren't the brightest animals in Tinga Tinga and they always did whatever the last beast said. So the animals decided to tell the Wildebeest that ‘they were welcome to stay in Tinga Tinga and they must never RUN!' So what did the Wildebeest do? They ran and they ran and they RAN! So that's Why Wildebeest Stampede! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep30
programme.desc: Why Chameleon Changes Colour - You see there was a time when Chameleon wasn't bright and colourful at all. In fact Chameleon was rather dull and grey… like a rainy day. One day when all the animals are playing games and sheltering from the rains Chameleon decides to slip away because he feels boring. Butterfly comes across Chameleon sitting sadly on a rock and shows him a rainbow. Chameleon can't resist and stands on the Rainbow, and TA-DAH!! He turns red and yellow and pink and green! Chameleon soaks up all the colours of the magical rainbow and now, KAPOW!! Chameleon can be any colour he wants! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep31
programme.desc: Why Leopard Has Spots - You see there was a time when Leopard didn't have spots. All the animals had something special; Lion had his mane, Peacock his beautiful tail, Zebra his stripes… but Leopard was as plain as plain can be. Then one day Leopard made friends with Puff Adder with his bright colourful spots. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep32
programme.desc: Why Hyena Has Short Back Legs - You see there was a time when Hyena didn't have short back legs. He was always chasing around and nipping other animals on the bottom. Then one day the animals had enough. It was time to teach that naughty Hyena a lesson! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep12
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Sickening Fumes of Smartsy Fartsy - In order to retrieve Mr. Krupp’s locked up rule book, George and Harold use an invention that ends up turning against them

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep13
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Troublesome Treachery of the Thieving Toot Fairy - George and Harold race against Mr. Krupp to try to get him fired before they get expelled

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep8
programme.desc: Into the Belly of the Den of the House of the Nest of Cats - Mom tries to help Tim get over his fear of the neighborhood crazy-cat-lady

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep9
programme.desc: Spirit Day - Mega Fat CEO Baby holds a game day at Baby Corp and Boss Baby must find a way to beat Mega Fat CEO Baby at his own game

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep68
programme.desc: Lost And Foundlings - When the Duchess comes to town declaring that she is ready to start a family, the Orphans have a competition to see who will be the lucky adoptee

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep42
programme.desc: Scrapbookmobile / Troll Rangers - When Biggie accidentally destroys a beloved scrapbook, he and Poppy set out to replace it by having a scrapbook-worthy adventure./ CJ Suki and Priscilla embark on a journey to earn Junior Troll Ranger patches for mastering Trolly activities.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep42
programme.desc: Who Arted? - King Julien is crazy with jealousy and throws out the kingdom's art after he is upstaged by Mort who is now the town's hottest new artist

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep42
programme.desc: Lucky and the Jam Jam - The PALs try to figure out why Marciela is acting so weird, while Miradero is gripped by April Fool’s Day fever

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep16
programme.desc: Bahama Drama - When Odlulu uses the Bubble Key to raise a sunken ship in the Bahamas, the Wanderers and Wizard Doubloon must take to the high-seas to catch this bubble-wielding buccaneer before she makes away with the ship's booty.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep3
programme.desc: Old Dog, New Tricks \ Snoozie-Hullabaloozie - Tag chooses to pair up with her Grandpaw for the Barker Family Talent Show, and together, they search for their winning talent. \ Tag is surprised to learn that today is the Pawston Snoozie-a-Hullabaloozie. With everything shut down for the day, Tag and Scooch take the opportunity to play all over town, while trying not to wake up other dogs.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep4
programme.desc: Gopher it! / A Glamping We Will Go - When a pesky gopher gets in the way of Fawna making her famous veggie stew, Niah learns to not let a bad experience, get in the way of doing good. / When the inexperienced Rona has to step in for Donna, the team makes sure everyone has the best camping trip ever.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep16
programme.desc: Divewings - When sea-dwelling dragons called Divewings start attacking ships near the island, the Rescue Riders have to find out what's making them so upset.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep31
programme.desc: The Case Of The Pink Lettuces - Something very strange is happening at the farm – all Farmer Tom's lettuces have been painted pink! Farmer Tom is really upset so Noddy offers to investigate. After talking to PatPat and Smartysaurus he realises that the Ninjas had asked Smartysaurus to make them pink paint so that they could paint the lettuces. They were using them as pom-poms to cheerlead Pink Ninja as she ran the Toyland Marathon Race! The Ninjas are very sorry that they upset Farmer Tom but he tells them that it's alright. They're welcome to his lettuces but next time, they should ask first! The race takes place and Pink Ninja wins! Thanks Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep32
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Jigsaw Puzzle Pieces - When some pieces from Big Ears' jigsaw puzzle go missing, Noddy investigates: where are the missing pieces? He soon realises someone must have taken them and draws up a list of suspects. Having discounted the Pirates and then the Naughticorns, Noddy is baffled. But when Pat-Pat and the Pockets invite him to share a piece of toy cake, Noddy suddenly has a breakthrough: maybe it wasn't one toy who took lots of pieces but lots of toys who each took one piece. Cloppycorn, Deltoid, Smartysaurus and Carlton all admit they took one piece. They didn't think they were doing any harm! Big Ears gets all the missing pieces back and everyone is at last able to enjoy his jigsaw puzzle of Toyland. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep42
programme.desc: Skunked! / Neighborhood Bird Watch - Archibald can’t wait to celebrate his Hatch Day with his family inside an impossibly fun theme park. But when Archibald accidentally gets sprayed by a skunk, he must try to get rid of his stank before his special day is ruined. / When Archibald overhears something suspicious about a neighbor, he reports it to his aunts who run the Neighborhood Bird Watch. With Archibald as their new recruit, they attempt to expose the neighbor’s suspicious shenanigans.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep17
programme.desc: The Good Surprise / Nightmare On Eep Street - When Ugga's new surprise attack fails, and she comes home in a bad mood, Thunk tries to cure it by finding a happy surprise for his mom/ Eep stays up all night to see the mysterious and rare Night Mare (a horse with a rainbow mane) when she's teased for thinking they're not real.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Disturbing Dilemma Of The Dysfunctional Doppelgangers - The crew meets their blue-hued doppelgängers when they crash-land on an alien planet where kids call all the shots.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Confusing Crisis Of The Conniving Captive - Melvin isn't exactly their friend ... but it's not like George and Harold can just let him be held captive by diabolical Biglyans, right? Right?!?

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep43
programme.desc: Doc Doc Who's There?/Tour Guide of Duty - In order to improve her bedside manner, Doctor Moonbloom embarks on a new career as a comedian. But could it be that this is her true calling?/ Branch is sick of Trolls not coming to him with their problems. Seeking to prove that he is a helpful Troll, he agrees to assist Tug Duluth in finding a new tour.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep44
programme.desc: Troll Playing Game/ Finn Cascade - Poppy discovers Branch hosting a Trolly roleplaying game in his Bunker. But when she joins the game, she insists on prioritizing fun over the rules, posing in-game problems for Branch./ Branch goes to great lengths to get a picture with Finn Cascade, the coolest fish in the Trolls Lagoon. But it seems as though Finn isn’t interested…

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep44
programme.desc: Chicago - Boss and family go on Spring Break to visit his grandparents in the big city of Chicago. Boss uses the trip to test his business mettle, by getting in a promotion war at a real big adult company. And when a department store refuses to let Gigi and Tim return an item, they wind up unionizing the entire sales force.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep45
programme.desc: Baby Boss - Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep73
programme.desc: Violet's Flower Festival - Violet is organising a flower festival. She is so busy helping the other tots with their blooms she has neglected hers. Will her flower open in time for the big day?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep74
programme.desc: Pumpkin Pie For Diggly - Diggly is bored of the same old scraps every day. Fifi and Bumble decide to make him a pumpkin pie as a surprise. But there's no flour left to make the pastry, what will they use instead?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep75
programme.desc: Rockabye Stingo - Fifi has lost Cottonsocks, her beloved toy rabbit. She searches the garden for it to no avail. But that couldn't be Stingo cuddling it could it?

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep33
programme.desc: How Can I Go Up And Down On The See-Saw? - Baa and Billie have built a fantastic new see-saw in the meadow. Jess can't wait to have a go. But when he tries to make it go up and down with him on one end and Baa and Billie on the other he just gets stuck in the air and can't get the see saw down. ‘How can I go up and down on the see saw?' he asks? -desperate to have all the ‘up and down' fun he see the puppies having when they jump on the see-saw. Jess asks Horace the hoppy frog what he knows about ‘up and down', he talks to Willow about scales and weighing things until finally he works it out – if he finds someone roughly the same weight as him – balanced just like the puppies were - he'll do it! He works out that Mimi - of all his friends- weighs about the same as him and just as he worked out they jump on the see saw and go up and down, up and down and have a fantastic time! Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep34
programme.desc: What Can I Do With My Nature Collection? - Jess shows Mimi his lovely Nature Collection. She really likes it and wonders what he's going to do with it. Now that's a good question! Jess thinks he'll display it but with the pups racing around it'd soon get damaged. He asks Horace if he could use it to make musical instruments, some things make a great sound but others aren't so good. It's time to go on a picnic with Mimi and his friends. Jess brings his Nature Collection along and when all his friends want to play a game Jess has a great idea. He's found the perfect thing to do with his Nature Collection! They can use them to make a funny obstacle course race. Brilliant!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep240
programme.desc: Pretend Friend - Suzy Sheep has made up a pretend friend called “Leo Lion”. Peppa cannot see Leo but Suzy says that Leo likes roaring and dressing up. Peppa decides that now she can see Leo. Even Mummy and Daddy Pig play along. But George feels a bit left out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep241
programme.desc: Pen Pal - Peppa has a French pen pal, a girl donkey, named Delphine. They also speak to each other on the telephone. Although Peppa speaks English and Delphine speaks French, they discover that they love lots of the same things.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep242
programme.desc: Granny and Granpa's Attic - Peppa and George are helping Granny and Grandpa Pig tidy their attic, but it's hard to decide what to throw out. Amongst the clutter, Peppa finds an old record player and some funny old records.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Bicycle - Bubu impresses his friends with a brand new bike he won in a contest. He encourages everyone else to ride it, Anna discovers why: Bubu doesn't know how to ride a two-wheeler!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep110
programme.desc: The Ukulele - Anna, Froga and Ron make up a song that Anna plays on her ukulele. But they accidentally end up breaking her cherished instrument in half! Ron and Froga do everything they can to stop Anna from finding out, finally they need to confess their mistake.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Blue's Dino Clues - It's a prehistoric game of Blue's Clues when a mysterious dinosaur egg falls out of the skidoo frame and starts to hatch! We figure out what kind of dinosaur is inside the egg so we can reunite the egg with their family.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep813
programme.desc: Pups Save a Show Jumper / Pups Save the Salmon - Winnie Winnington goes looking for a frog to enter in a frog-jumping contest and ends up needing rescued in a swamp. // The pups must help salmon get to the ocean and also need to rescue Alex who gets stuck on top of a dam.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep823
programme.desc: Pups Save the Portable Pet Wash - Mayor Humdinger steals Katie's Portable Pet Wash and ends up causing bubble trouble all over town

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Steel Antlers / Berry Bad - Sir Steel dons fake antlers to join the Deer Squad as they plan a surprise birthday party for Tina Turtle. // Sir Steel is infuriated when berries stain his new coat. Deer Squad must stop his mech-feet stamp stompers from destroying the berry bushes.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Paddington Saves the Bees / Paddington & the Heat Wave - Paddington learns about bees & decides to help them make honey by planting a flower garden but someone thinks they're weeds! // There's a heatwave in Windsor Gardens & Mateo has sold out of ice-creams so he and Paddington create a new flavor!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Ants on a Log - Tiny Chef makes Ants-on-a-Log for a picnic, but has to solve a mystery when the food starts to disappear!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep825
programme.desc: Rubble and Wild and a Yarn Ball! / Skye and Rory Flip It / Marshall, Leo and a Ferris Wheel / Everest, Shade and the Mountain Goat - Rubble & Wild rescue animals from a giant runaway ball of yarn. // Skye and Rory rescue a painter hanging from a scaffold. // Marshall & Leo rescue animals stuck on a Ferris Wheel.// Everest and Shade rescue a baby mountain goat stuck in a crevasse.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep826
programme.desc: Pups Stop a Big Leak / Pups Save a Baby Anteater / Pups Save a Hatch Day / Pups Save the Munchie Mobile - The Pups rescue Francois from a water tower geyser. // The Pups rescue a baby anteater stuck on a bucking RoboHorse. // The Pups rescue Ace and her special delivery for Chickaletta's party. // The Pups rescue Mr. Porter and his stranded Food Truck.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Show and Smell - Bossy and Turtle bring fun and weird smelling food for "Show and Smell".

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Don't Look Now - During a sleepover Bossy and Turtle watch a scary movie but may have bitten off more than they can chew.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Missing Falcon - Bossy and Turtle go full gumshoe to find Bissy's missing plushy.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Masked Fishy / The Best Friends Game - When a mysterious masked fish is causing trouble for Goldie's magnum opus, Detective Baby Shark must catch the culprit. // When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up to stop them on live TV.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Baby Mayor / Sink or Swim - The fate of the city's squidapple supply lies in Baby's fins when he accidentally assumes the role of Mayor on a big day. // The Sharks go on the family game show Sink or Swim and find they're in hot water with their competition, the Fishes.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Triton's Trumpet / The Curse of the Pirate Baby - Santiago and crew must retrieve a powerful undersea artifact after it's stolen by Enrique. // Bonnie Bones transforms into a baby and it's up to the good pirates to change her back.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Abuelo's Treasure - The crew is on a mission to rescue Abuelo's long lost treasure, but when the boys fall asleep it's up to the girls to save the day!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep243
programme.desc: School Camp - Peppa and her friends are going camping with Madame Gazelle. When it gets dark, they all sing a song around the campfire. When it is time for bed, Peppa and her friends get a little scared and all the children end up sleeping in Madame Gazelle’s tent

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep227
programme.desc: The Long Grass - The grass has grown so long that Peppa and George's ball gets lost. Grandpa arrives with his fantastic lawnmower and gets the grass cut in no time. Peppa and George find their plastic ball again and it bounces brilliantly on the short grass!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep244
programme.desc: The Toy Cupboard - Peppa and George's toy basket is full and their beds are covered in toys. Mummy Pig orders a new toy cupboard, but it needs to be assembled – and Mummy and Daddy Pig are not good at DIY.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep245
programme.desc: Captain Daddy Pig - Peppa and her family borrow Grandpa Pig’s boat for a day on the river. Daddy Pig is the captain, Peppa, George and Mummy Pig are the crew. When the boat gets stuck in some long reeds. Daddy Pig has to use all his strength to push the boat free.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep246
programme.desc: The Quarrel - Peppa and Suzy Sheep are having a quarrel and decide they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but they still refuse to make up.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep507
programme.desc: Shadows - Peppa and George realize that they have shadows and no matter what they do, they can't escape from them.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Barbazoo Can't Say ''No'' / The Doppelganger - Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy. // By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Dinosaur Parade - Blaze, AJ, and lots of spectators have gathered to watch herds of dinosaurs march through Axle City! But Crusher pushes his way into the parade, scattering dinos everywhere. It's up to Blaze, AJ, and Zeg to find and rescue them!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep704
programme.desc: Knights in Sparkling Armor - When Crusher and Pickle are trapped inside a cage over a bubbling slime swap, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Sparkle to become...Knights! Will they be able to rescue Crusher and Pickle from the swamp before it's too late?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep418

programme.desc: Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf - When a baby T-Rex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a daring mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him. // When Everest joins the Paw Patrol for a visit to the jungle, she makes friends with a clumsy elephant calf and then must help rescue him.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Best in Flow / Blizzard Wizard - Baby and Teensy embrace their fancy side to win a dance contest for pets. // When the owner of Iceberg Ice Cream, Scoops, has to rush out on a frosty emergency, he leaves Baby Shark and William in charge of his parlor.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: The Lost Jelly - When a visitor blows into Carnivore Cove, Baby's communication skills are put to the test.

They can't be true, can they? // Paddington, Jonathan & Judy decide to create a newspaper but they need a front page story!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Paddington Shares A Good Deed / Paddington Goes Green - Mr. Gruber does a good turn for Paddington & says he can thank him by passing it on to someone else, which is harder than it sounds! // Paddington learns all about composting thanks to Mr. Mulch, but will he grow flowers in time for Aunt Lucy?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep248
programme.desc: Bouncy Ball - Peppa and George are playing in the garden with their bouncy ball when Suzy Sheep turns up with two tennis rackets. She uses the bouncy ball to play a game of tennis with Peppa, making George feel left out. Will the job of ball boy cheer him up?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep249
programme.desc: The Powercut - One day all the lights suddenly go out and Peppa’s house is plunged into darkness. There has been a power cut. While they wait for the electricity to come on again, Peppa and George have fun looking for a torch and thinking of games to play.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep250
programme.desc: Daddy Pig's Birthday - Today is Daddy Pig's birthday, but he has to go to work. While he is away, Mummy Pig, Peppa and George prepare a special birthday surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep251
programme.desc: Sleepover - Peppa is going for a sleepover at Zoë Zebra’s house with Suzy Sheep, Rebecca Rabbit, Candy Cat and Emily Elephant. The girls stay up playing games and having fun. At last they feel sleepy. They all snuggle up in their sleeping bags and fall asleep.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep607
programme.desc: Robo Puppy! - When a bossy cyborg named the Glitch hacks all the robots in Robotopolis and forces them to dance "The Robot," it's up to Robot Mechanic Molly and Robo Puppy to stop him before it's too late!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep303
programme.desc: No Time Like The Present Store - At the Present Store, Joe's running a contest, whoever guesses the mystery present gets to unwrap it! What could be inside this special gift?! We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep305
programme.desc: Building with Blue - Josh invites YOU to be a part of the construction crew! Blue and Magenta are building something special, and we need to play Blue and Magenta's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Triton's Trumpet / The Curse of the Pirate Baby - Santiago and crew must retrieve a powerful undersea artifact after it's stolen by Enrique. // Bonnie Bones transforms into a baby and it's up to the good pirates to change her back.

programme.desc: Legendary Loot / Yup Day - After finding a map to the Legendary Loot, the Shark family splits up to hunt the treasure down. // Baby convinces Daddy to say 'yup' to everything for a day. What's the worst that could happen?

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Happy Bestie-versary - Bossy and Turtle decide to exchange gifts for their first annual friendship anniversary.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Tumminator - Bossy and Turtle have to face the scariest ride ever at Wacky Wacky World: The Tumminator!

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep102

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep912
programme.desc: Pups Save a Lonely Ghost - Rubble dreams that he meets a ghost and learns that it's not easy to help a ghost make new friends.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep420
programme.desc: Pups Save the Mail / Pups Save a Frog Mayor - The postman's truck gets stuck in the mud and the mail gets stuck in a tree. // Mayor Goodway turns into a frog.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Mummy Rabbit's Bump - Everyone is excited when Mummy Rabbit arrives with some big news-she is pregnant! Will it be one baby or twins?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep511
programme.desc: Pedro the Cowboy - Pedro Pony pretends he is a proper cowboy, telling everyone stories in the camp he has set up in the garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep512
programme.desc: Peppa and George's Garden - Grandpa Pig pops round with some seeds for Peppa and George. Daddy Pig helps out by being a scarecrow

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep117
programme.desc: A Very Busy Afternoon - Froga organises a gathering to share jam sandwiches with everyone, Ron and Christopher want to show off their acrobatic frisbee skills, Bubu invents a new game he wants to teach his friends - all at the same time!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep118
programme.desc: The Four-Leaf Clover - Anna and her friends have organized a hula hoop competition and Froga relies on her four-leaf clover to help her win! But when she loses it, Froga is convinced there is no way she'll ever win.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Blue's Big Beat Band - Josh and Blue are starting a band! As we play Blue's Clues to find out what instrument Blue will play, we form our very own house band, learn rhythms, identify tempos, and sing, tap, and clap all day long.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep306
programme.desc: A Blue's Clues Festival of Lights - Everyone's at Periwinkle's house celebrating Hanukkah, the festival of lights! Well, not everyone, exactly. There's a special, surprise guest coming to our Hanukkah party, and we'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Pup Pup Goose / Pup Pup and Away - Marshal gets a new BFF when a gosling he names “Fuzzy” takes a liking to him. // When Mayor Goodway accidentally takes off in a hot air balloon, Ryder and the Paw Patrol must make a dramatic rescue to save her and win the race!

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Turnip For The Books / Magnet Maelstrom - Sir Steel almost crushes Platinum city with a giant turnip during a Vegetable Show. // When Sir Steel collects metal in the city for Muffin's pooch pamper parlor using a giant magnet, Deer Squad has to think out of the box to stop him.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Over the rainbow / We're toast - The search for gold at the end of the rainbow leads the Deer Squad to an amazing Frost Mountain and a new deer friend! // The Deer Squad have to deal with a cheesy situation thanks to Sir Steel's latest invention - The Giant Toaster!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Paddington's Nature Club / Paddington's not Himself - Mr. Curry wants to become a ranger leader & creates nature club to impress Ms. Potts but are his facts correct? // Paddington has a fall and loses his climbing confidence - without climbing he doesn't feel like himself at all - what can he do?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Bread - Tiny Chef bakes bread but forgets to watch his rising dough and needs to think fast when the dough grows too big!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep905
programme.desc: Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest - With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll. // When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep907
programme.desc: Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art - Julius loses his tooth and has a dream that the Paw Patrol saves a bumbling Tooth Fairy. // When all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival, the PAW Patrol must solve the Missing Art Mystery and return all the paintings.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Honey Bear - When Bossy's cousin Honey Bear comes to visit, he struggles to be a a good friend.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Science Pair - Bossy and Turtle try to make the coolest science fair project so they can become hall monitors.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep103

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Fort Fin-ship / Water Buggin - When Baby and his friends build a clubhouse, Hank has no idea what to put in his personal nook. // When a noisy water bug takes up residence in the Shark's home, the family will do whatever it takes to reclaim the peace and quiet they lost.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Captain Kelp / Teensy the Tardigrade - As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick? // Baby Shark adopts a teensy tiny pet, but is he ready for a big responsibility?

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep218
programme.desc: The Lost Treasure of Merlandia - When Anani learns of a treasure chest filled with magic pearls, she enlists the help of the Pirate Protectors to find it.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Comet Cupcakes / Tina's New Friend - The crew help Capt. Sprinkles find a flower to make his special cupcakes but when Escarlata steals it they must get it back.// While trying to stop Bonnie Bones, Tina accidentally gets separated and makes a new friend in the form of an ancient robot!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Pedro's Cough - Pedro gets a contagious cough at daycare and other children soon catch it. When it's time to go the grown-ups catch it too, including Madame Gazelle. Doctor Brown Bear gives them terrible-tasting medicine, but who will look after him when he is sick?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep228
programme.desc: Zoe Zebra, the Postman's Daughter - Mr. Zebra the Postman gets help from his daughter Zoë. Zoë has a very special letter for Peppa and George; an invitation to her birthday party. The party is fun, especially as it turns out that Zoë has invited all of Peppa and George’s friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep304
programme.desc: The Library - Daddy Pig has a book from the library that he has kept for too long. The family go to the library to return it and find more books to read.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep305
programme.desc: The Camper Van - Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep306
programme.desc: The Camping Holiday - Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river, and are surprised when they learn that their van can convert into a boat!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep513
programme.desc: The Flying Vet - Doctor Hamster is rushed off her feet when nearly all the animals need her help on the same day.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Barbabravo Is Not Feeling Well / Be Patient Barbabravo... - Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Sky Track - Swoops the helicopter loses his rotor, and without it he can’t fly! It’s time for Blaze and AJ to retrieve the runaway rotor, adventuring up onto The Sky Track, an amazing course that weaves through the clouds.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep706
programme.desc: The Snowflake Games - It's a head-to-head showdown when Blaze and Crusher enter... The Snowflake Games! Who will win the most winter sports and receive the prized Snowflake Medal?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep917
programme.desc: Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger - When Mayor Humdinger tricks Katie into watching his kitties, an alarm is set off and the Paw Patrol must rescue them. // Mayor Humdinger swipes one of Ryder's early inventions - an aircraft and must be rescued from an out-of-control flight.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Pups Make a Splash / Pups Fall Festival - When Cap’n Turbot’s boat runs aground, Ryder, Zuma, Skye, and Rocky must team up to save it before it sinks! // The PAW Patrol must pick all Farmer Yumi’s fruit before an early snowstorm comes! But how can Chase help?

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep203
programme.desc: The Secret Password / Monday Funday - The fishy friends find themselves locked out when they can't remember the secret password to get inside their clubhouse. // The Sharks compete in a series of games to see which of them is the Monday Funday Chomp-ion.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Coral Dilemma - When Vigo steals the color from the coral in Carnivore Cove, it's up to Super Shark and Captain Kelp to bring it back!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Paddington Visits the Doctor / Paddington and the Sleep Over - Paddington hurts his knee & goes to see Dr Yasmin. When she steps out, he steps UP and is mistaken for a doctor. // Can Mr. Brown's sleepover live up to Mrs. Brown's high standard when Simi and Toq come to stay for the night?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Paddington's Hatching Surprise / Paddington the Best Bear - Paddington helps to hatch an egg, but it takes ages and when it finally cracks open he gets a real surprise! // Paddington wishes he could have been at Mr. and Mrs. Brown's wedding after seeing some photos, so they decide to do it all again!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Compost - Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside the bin turn the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Richard Rabbit Comes to Play - Richard Rabbit comes to play with George, and Suzy Sheep comes to play with Peppa! The boys and girls don't want to play the same games, but they all like jumping up and down in muddy puddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Fun Run - Daddy Pig finds it hard work when he runs a race to raise money for the school roof, but it's easier to run when a wasp is chasing him!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Washing - Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too – which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep610
programme.desc: Mystery On The Guppy Express! - When Oona's Bubble Kitty goes missing aboard the Guppy Express, Detective Nonny steps in to help. Knowing the cat must be on board, they race to find her before the train reaches its next stop--and Bubble Kitty may be lost for good!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Blue's Snowy Day Surprise - There are SNOW many great things to do on a snowy day like today, but Blue's surprise may be the best! We'll play a wintry game of Blue's Clues to figure out what her surprise is.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Blue's Backyard Sports Spectacular - It's a Backyard Sports Spectacular! Coach Josh and friends are playing all the sports and getting ready for a soccer game! But Magenta isn't ready for the big game. We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help Magenta feel ready to play!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep218
programme.desc: The Lost Treasure of Merlandia - When Anani learns of a treasure chest filled with magic pearls, she enlists the help of the Pirate Protectors to find it.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Pig Island - When Barbarito swipes the Windless Sail from Pig Island, the crew teams up their new pig friends to retrieve it.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep106
programme.desc: When You Wish Upon a Fish / Shark-Off - Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain and make a wish on the legendary shooting starfish, Ol' Sea Breeze. // Shadow challenges Baby Shark to a Shark-Off to prove who's the sharkiest shark.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Cart-tastrophe - Bossy schemes to get Turtle new Boom Boom Super Satang cards.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Turtle's Shell Day - Bossy plans a Shell Day party for Turtle without considering what Turtle wants.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Way of the Gran-Gran - Bossy and Turtle learn how to be patient from the Master.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep912
programme.desc: Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch - When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep15

programme.title: Semua Tentang Kita - Malaysia Madani Khas #2 (Rpt)
programme.desc: Episod Semuanya Tentang Kita: Malaysia Madani (Khas) akan meninjau keadaan sampah-sarap yang dibuang manusia, pengutipan, pengurusan dan pelupusan yang terancang hasil kerjasama pihak-pihak yang berwajib. Perlukah sampah diasingkan sebelum dimasukkan ke dalam tong sampah? Selain melupuskan sampah ke dalam tong-tong sampah, patutkah penduduk memberikan perhatian kepada usaha mengitar semula atau mengkompos sampah makanan mereka? Saksikan dokumentari khas ini, hanya di BERNAMA TV.

programme.desc: Expectation, excitement and hope as the Matildas get their World Cup campaign underway against Ireland, the Ashes and the start of the NRLW and Netball World Cup. Plus Victoria will no longer host the 2026 Commonwealth Games.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 19 - Melbourne v Adelaide Ep111
programme.desc: Wins over St Kilda and Brisbane has seen Melbourne shore up their hold on fourth spot on the ladder. The Demons host Adelaide at the MCG in Round 19 after the Crows slipped outside the top 8 after a 14 point loss to GWS.

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep59
programme.desc: For the latest news as it happens ABC News is the home of breaking news, compelling stories and Australia's best investigative journalism. Round the clock coverage of the news that matters to you from the team you can trust.

programme.title: Ticket To The Cup - Tony Gustavsson - Interview Ep11
programme.desc: The Matildas are one of Australia's most successful sporting teams and among the favourites to win the 2023 FIFA Women's World Cup. Tracey Holmes asked coach Tony Gustavsson about the pressure and opportunity as host nation.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep59
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's top stories. Plus reporters investigating the issues that matter. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Back Roads - Strzelecki Track, SA (Part 2) Ep10
programme.desc: Sr. 9 - Back Roads continues the journey on the challenging Strzelecki Track, heading up to Innamincka in the top corner of South Australia. Heather Ewart finds out what it takes to survive a job on this remote and historic track.

programme.title: Elements - Water Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - On the tiny Island of Dauan in the north west of the Torres Strait, spirituality and culture is deeply connected to the water and sea country that surrounds the Island.

programme.title: Mystery Road: Origin Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Jay discovers Jack was deeply in debt and when Sputty also seems to be involved he becomes suspicious. Jay and Mary grow closer, Anousha acts for Ziggy and the Kelly Gang unexpectedly strikes again.

programme.title: The China Century - Economic Miracle Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - The story of China's meteoric economic growth and its earth-shattering repercussions.

programme.title: Escape From The City - Daylesford Vic: The Iletts Ep28
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Presenter Del Irani shows HR executive Simone, and her best friend Vesna, four quirky and unique properties in Daylesford. However, the Victorian town is a property hotspot and steep prices may derail this search.

programme.title: Anh's Brush With Fame - Michael Clarke Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - From the age of five, Michael Clarke dreamt of playing for Australia. Hear the personal stories behind the headlines that made him a poster boy of modern cricket. How will Anh capture his determination and schoolboy charm?

programme.title: ABC National News Ep147

programme.title: Grand Sumo Highlights

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Bitoh Tomomi came in second place in the women's race of the 2021 Marathon des Sables, a 250 km multi-stage run across the Sahara Desert. She talks about her passion for pushing her limits.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: This time, we follow Ugandan Kato Edrine, a 16-year-old baseball pitcher in Hyogo who dreams of going pro, as well as Chinese Feng Li who works in marketing for a pharmaceutical firm in Tokyo.

programme.title: Amami: Shimauta
programme.desc: Shimauta is the soul music of Amami Oshima. Islanders have long used it to convey feelings in good times and bad. The history of the music and of the island itself is conveyed in time-lapse footage.

programme.title: Newsline Asia 24
programme.desc: This daily news program picks up the key news stories of the past 24 hours from Japan and around Asia.

programme.title: Learn Japanese From The News
programme.desc: We study a story about how Japan recently banned the import and sale of red swamp crayfish and pond slider turtles, two invasive species that have been wreaking havoc on local ecosystems.

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: #40 Since it was my first earthquake, I was startled. / To explain the reason for your action, say the reason followed by the particle "kara," then the action.

programme.title: Culture Crossroads
programme.desc: NHK World Thai language reporter Chairat Thomya visits a town in Iwate that was ravaged by the 2011 tsunami, looking to find out how people can live with and pass on the memories of natural disasters.

programme.title: Hello! NHK World-Japan
programme.desc: This time we introduce "The Unknown Master of Restoration," which shows Mayuyama Koji's ability to restore any piece of pottery, regardless of how broken it may be.
